Replace.Text: At the beginning of the game, the technologies of "navigation" and "shipbuilding" are unlocked, and at the same time, you have the ability to enter the ocean cell. The capital initially acquires a large number of plots. City tiles on this continent cannot auto-expand. All output of cities located on other continents -50%, but cell expansion rate +200%, loyalty unchanged. Cities with saplings +30% [ICON_Food] Food, [ICON_Production] Productivity, [ICON_Faith] Faith

+75%[ICON_Science]Technology[NEWLINE] "The main god of Dijin, the so-called Jiazi, is also the root of the tree. Waiting for the root is to sacrifice to the ground. Those who live on the ground and their wives sacrifice to their wives, so-called those who stay in bed. But be kind..."

+75%[ICON_Culture]Cultural[NEWLINE] "The main god of Dijin, the so-called Jiazi, is also the root of the tree. Waiting for the root is to sacrifice to the ground. Those who live on the ground and their wives sacrifice to their wives, so-called those who stay in bed. But be kind..."

+75%[ICON_Gold]Gold Coin[NEWLINE] "The Lord God of Dijin, the so-called Jiazi, is also the root of the tree. Waiting for the root is to sacrifice to the ground. Those who live on the ground and their wives sacrifice to their wives, so-called those who stay in bed. But be kind..."
In front of the awe-inspiring sacred tree, the great god of production, and the god of the great god, I beg repeatedly, offer offerings, beg and pray, please listen to my words calmly and peacefully

Including Mebuki and Yukaiko, more than half of the defenders hold the gun sword as a weapon. The gun sword can be used not only as a thrusting weapon, but also as a firearm, and it is a weapon that can be used both far and near. [NEWLINE] Instead of catapults, they can carry out long-range attacks, but their melee combat power is weak, and they need shield team protection

The shield team held huge shields, and these shields were enlarged and combined to form an extremely strong wall that seemed to surround the entire army. [NEWLINE]Replaces warriors, increases combat power when defending, reduces combat power when attacking, and provides combat power bonuses for surrounding units

Shizuku Yamabushi, this extremely speechless girl, for some reason always clings to the indifferent Mebuki, always following her. [NEWLINE] If you are in our territory, your health will be restored automatically, if you are in the enemy's territory [ICON_Movement], your movement power will be +1, and your combat effectiveness will not be reduced if you are injured.

Kaga Castle Sparrow, too unconfident about himself, extremely negative [NEWLINE] When defending, the combat power is greatly increased, and when the attack is reduced, the surrounding allies automatically recover their health
Replaces Trailblazer, has combat ability but cannot attack, moves fast, and accelerates surrounding units, cannot be captured
When the unit is located on another continent, +1 [ICON_Movement] movement power, +5 [ICON_Strength] combat power
Trade routes to other continents +2 [ICON_Gold] gold coins, 1 [ICON_Food] food, sea [ICON_Movement] +1 movement
In my unit, there are absolutely no dead people. This is the oath I made to myself.
Likes civilizations that explore a lot, dislikes civilizations that don't explore

Anti-personnel is divided into three types. The gun sword type that holds the gun sword to eliminate foreign enemies, the shield type that holds the giant shield for specialized defense, and the commander type that commands the above two types to give instructions. The Commander type also holds the Gunsword, but the power of the Gunsword and the defense of the suit are higher than those of the normal Gunsword. [NEWLINE] The composition of the anti-personnel team is 16 people of gun sword type including Yukaiko Maitreya and Shizuku Yamabushi, 8 people of shield type including Kaga Castle Sparrow, and 8 commanders such as Kusu Mebuki. The shield-type defenders are called the shield team, and the gun-sword type and commander are collectively called the gun-sword team.

I don't need the so-called "brave" title given by your amnesty. I want to aim for the hero I dreamed of, and one day I will definitely realize it. [NEWLINE]ââWhat is your ideal hero? [NEWLINE]An existence that will not sacrifice anyone. A brave man is one who opens up a path that no longer requires sacrifice.
Maitreya-san, we will definitely fulfill our expectations. I want to be a brave man, and Maitreya-san wants to revive the family... must, make all this a reality.
Kumobuki likes civilizations that explore a lot
Nan Yabuki doesn't like civilizations that don't explore
Kumobuki likes civilizations that explore a lot
Nan Yabuki doesn't like civilizations that don't explore
Make meritorious service here, let Maitreya's family...
Likes civilizations that explore a lot, dislikes civilizations that don't explore
Kumobuki likes civilizations that explore a lot
Nan Yabuki doesn't like civilizations that don't explore
Kumobuki likes civilizations that explore a lot
Nan Yabuki doesn't like civilizations that don't explore
+400% [ICON_Production] Production when building saplings in this city
The protection of the sacred tree
All units in the territory +5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength

When the shield team and the gunsword team are adjacent to each other, the combat power of each other will be increased by 3 [ICON_Strength], and the movement power of the survey ship [ICON_Movement] will be +1
[ICON_Faith] can be used to buy survey ships, shield teams and gun sword teams
Shenmu: Our units within 2 cells +1 [ICON_Movement] movement
Shenmu: Our units within 2 cells +1 [ICON_Movement] movement
Asylum: Our units within 1 cell +2 [ICON_Strength] combat power
Asylum: Our units within 1 cell +2 [ICON_Strength] combat power
Twin Souls: Automatically restore health when located in our territory, [ICON_Movement] movement +1 when located in the enemy's territory, injury will not reduce combat effectiveness
Twin Souls: Automatically restore health when located in our territory, [ICON_Movement] movement +1 when located in the enemy's territory, injury will not reduce combat effectiveness
Instinct: When defending, the combat power is greatly increased, and when attacking, the combat power is reduced. Our units within 1 cell automatically recover their health.
Instinct: When defending, the combat power is greatly increased, and when attacking, the combat power is reduced. Our units within 1 cell automatically recover their health.
Equipment improvement: research completed ironmaking, apprenticeship, gunpowder, military science, part standardization, synthetic materials, composite materials, +10 [ICON_Strength] combat power
Equipment improvement: research completed ironmaking, apprenticeship, gunpowder, military science, part standardization, synthetic materials, composite materials, +10 [ICON_Strength] combat power
Guardian: +1 [ICON_Movement] movement power, +5 [ICON_Strength] combat power when the unit is located in another continent
Guardian: +1 [ICON_Movement] movement power, +5 [ICON_Strength] combat power when the unit is located in another continent
In the name of Maitreya's family: Sea [ICON_Movement] Movement +1
In the name of Maitreya's family: Sea [ICON_Movement] Movement +1
Located outside the capital continent +5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength
Are you willing to accept our friendship?
I must become a hero... For this goal, no matter what kind of mission it is, I will complete it for you to see...

If you waste time getting close to people, you won't win the selection. Helping out with other people's training, spending your own training time on other people's... To be honest, I think it's so naive. As long as you retain that innocence, I will be chosen as the hero in the end.
Would you like to entertain our envoy?
very good! We will never be the next pad! Such a wheel is for me to destroy! !
As long as you retain that innocence, I will be chosen as the hero in the end. [NEWLINE] (condemns you)
This is the first time we meet, I am the captain of the anti-personnel, Nan Mebuki, who are you
Would you like to have a meal at the Golden Tower Cafeteria?
Do you want to come to the Golden Tower cafeteria to have a meal, and share our information by the way?
Are you also here to investigate? So, let's start our mission! This time there will be no victims, and all members will complete the task together!

Amnesty clearly judged me as disqualified...but now, they called me over again because they needed manpower. Use me as a convenient tool...! And we're not brave yet. It's just a boring job like a mass-produced type... Even if we can't become heroes, it just means that this level can be done somehow! ? Do you take me for a fool! !
Would you like to join us in forging a path that no longer entails sacrifices?
I absolutely will not agree! ! I am the one worthy of a brave man! !
Are you willing to accept Miss Ben's friendship?
This level of miscellaneous fish, no matter how many there are, is not an opponent for me, Mitreya Xihaizi.
Miss Ben will defeat you and turn it into the merit of the Maitreya family!
Would you like to entertain Miss Ben's envoy?
Being taught by junior students...is a disgrace to the Maitreya family!
This level of miscellaneous fish, no matter how many there are, is not an opponent for me, Mitreya Xihaizi. [NEWLINE] (condemns you)

When we met for the first time, I was the vice-captain of Fangren, Maitreya Xihaizi. This lady will make achievements that can be affirmed by Amnesty, and I will definitely restore the reputation of Maitreya's family. Although defending people is a dangerous, humble and humiliating mission, in order to enhance the family's reputation, I will not hesitate to crawl on the ground, even suck muddy water.
Let Miss Ben tell you about the magnificent history of the Maitreya family.
Introduce yourself, and instead, let Miss Ben tell you the splendid history of the Maitreya family.
As the daughter of the famous Maitreya family, it is only natural to protect those around her. This is also the so-called noble duty!
Training and actual combat are different. In the actual task, I, Maitreya Xihaizi, will make achievements above you!
Would you like to join Miss Ben to revive the Maitreya family?
Miss Ben, it's not time to die
